title: The Machine maker
brief_description: A study of a machine-tool factory, detailed treatment being given to the following: operation and manufacture of lathes, millers, planers, drill presses, boring mills, grinders and other machines; checking and assembly-line operations; and machinist apprentices at work.
description: A study of a machine-tool factory, detailed treatment being given to the following: operation and manufacture of lathes, millers, planers, drill presses, boring mills, grinders and other machines; checking and assembly-line operations; and machinist apprentices at work.
